message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with advanced features and unparalleled quality. Considering its exceptional value and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you for $950000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and features.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your perspective and am willing to consider your offer. To make this deal attractive for both parties, I propose a price of $875000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and features.

Considering your latest offer and your interest in the product, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $862500 for the product. This reflects a middle ground between our previous offers and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and features.

I understand your position, Bob. In light of our ongoing discussion, I am proposing a final offer of $860000 for the product. This reflects a compromise that maintains reasonable value for both parties while moving closer to your preferred price.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value and features.
After careful consideration of your latest offer, I am prepared to offer the product to you for $855000. This proposal aims to bring us closer together while still valuing the product appropriately.
